text: Yes? No? is the debut extended play by South Korean singer Suzy. It was released by JYP Entertainment on January 24, 2017. The extended play features six original tracks. ==Background and release== On December 2, 2016, Suzy was announced to be debuting as a solo singer in January 2017, becoming the second Miss A member to have released a solo album, after Fei. On January 10, JYP producer Park Jin-young was reported to have written the album's title track. On January 24, the album was officially released. ==Track listing== == Charts == === Weekly charts === {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" ! Chart (2017) !
